str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From pros and echo; to hold the mind towards, i.e. Pay attention to, be cautious about, apply oneself to, adhere to.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: Himself, herself, itself.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To weight, load, burden, lit. and met. From barus; to weigh down.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Drunken dissipation, surfeiting. Probably from the same as harpazo; properly, a headache from drunkenness, i.e. a debauch.
Deep drinking, drunkenness. Apparently a primary word; an intoxicant, i.e. intoxication.
And, even, also, namely.
Care, worry, anxiety. From merizo; solicitude.
Belonging to ordinary life, worldly. From a derivative of bioo; relating to the present existence.
And, even, also, namely.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To stand by, be urgent, befall one (as of evil), be at hand, impend. From epi and histemi; to stand upon, i.e. Be present.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Unexpected, sudden. From a compound of a and phaino; unexpected, i.e. suddenly.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
From pegnumi; a trap; figuratively, a trick or statagem.
